text: Zisas mbara ana ŋgarkarav khaŋ nzuai, “Gu gari nan piin ki bigi, nta kha nuianan ntɨɨri fhuvara. Gu gari nan piin ki bigi, nta kha nuiana bigi kake, gu nzuaim, nan ŋaara gumgi khavgia ntara mbuim, guma the na ndim Zudaiŋ farve khɨngia ntɨɨŋ. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, gu gari nan piin ki bigi, nta kha nuiana ntɨɨri fhuvara.”
